description.short: Operating system for manufacturing applications
description.long: An operating system and developer tools for factory and workflow management, Actyx enables developers to build resilient, real-time applications that run across a network of devices.

ctaCard.title: Developer resources
ctaCard.description: How-tos, reference guides, concept docs, and tutorials.

description.short: Decentralized search engine for ENS + IPFS websites
description.long: Built purely on top of IPFS, Almonit's search engine is itself decentralized, working without a server while preserving the privacy of users.

description.short: Self-governing ENS + IPFS publishing platform
description.long: A self-governing ENS + IPFS publishing platform designed to make decentralized content publication simpler.

ctaCard.title: Alpress testnet launch
ctaCard.description: Announcing the Alpress testnet and how to use it.

description.short: Operating system for a user-owned digital world
description.long: A multi-app operating system focusing on privacy and users' ownership of their own data while also breaking down the barriers between applications present in today's digital world.

ctaCard.title: Anytype news
ctaCard.description: Follow the Anytype project's progress in the news section of Anytype's community site.

description.short: Decentralized music streaming platform
description.long: Digital streaming service that connects fans directly with artists and exclusive new music in a familiar music player interface while enabling immutable content records, premium features incentivized on a native token, and a decentralized governance structure.

stats.label: Independent discovery and creator node providers

ctaCard.title: Audius case study
ctaCard.description: Learn how Audius uses IPFS to directly connect creators and listeners.

description.short: Global, no-limit betting platform and decentralized oracle
description.long: Augur is a global, no-limit betting platform and decentralized oracle that uses a combination of community pinning and self-pinning clients to keep itself distributed through the network. It also uses IPFS to host snapshot data computed by all clients, and uses Augur's own market for consensus.

ctaCard.title: Augur whitepaper
ctaCard.description: Dig into the details of Augur in the project whitepaper.

description.short: Secure peer-to-peer messaging app
description.long: Berty is a secure peer-to-peer messaging app that works with or without internet access, cellular data, or trust in the network.

ctaCard.title: Berty community portal
ctaCard.description: Resources for the Berty user and developer community.

description.short: Global blockchain infrastructure empowering the music industry
description.long: BitSong aims to decentralize music industry tooling and reduce bureaucracy in order to offer artists a fast, transparent, meritocratic earning model while offering listeners a way to be rewarded for listening to music.

ctaCard.title: BitSong web player
ctaCard.description: Explore BitSong's player in a web app.

description.short: Privacy-focused web browser
description.long: Privacy-focused web browser that allows seamless browsing for IPFS sites using a built-in node, opening easy use of the decentralized web to everyone.

ctaCard.title: Brave + IPFS
ctaCard.description: Get a technical overview of how Brave integrates IPFS

description.short: Decentralized identity and open data on the Ceramic network
description.long: Created by 3Box Labs, Ceramic is a decentralized network for managing mutable information on the open internet; IDX is a decentralized, cross-platform identity standard built on Ceramic.

ctaCard.title: 3Box Labs blog
ctaCard.description: Keep up with the evolution of the 3Box Labs product suite, including Ceramic and IDX.

description.short: Crypto wallet offering access over IPFS
description.long: Coinomi is a security-forward, multi-chain wallet with support for a wide variety of blockchains and tokens — as well as access available over IPFS.

description.short: IPFS pinning service on the Polkadot ecosystem
description.long: Crust Network, a blockchain-based decentralized storage network in the Polkadot ecosystem, provides a decentralized IPFS pinning service.

ctaCard.title: Understand Crust
ctaCard.description: Learn how Crust supports IPFS as a file layer protocol.

description.short: Easy-to-use API for building dweb apps
description.long: daemon.land takes the hardest parts of developing dweb apps — user authentication, databases, key management, and access control — and wraps them up into a single, fast, easy-to-use API.

description.short: Marketplace for climate data
description.long: dClimate is a transparent, decentralized marketplace where climate data, forecasts, and models are standardized, monetized, and distributed using a framework of immutable records for climate data.

ctaCard.title: dClimate case study
ctaCard.description: Learn how dClimate uses IPFS to bring climate data to the world.

description.short: DeFi data validation with self-sovereign identity focus
description.long: Bloom enables DeFi applications to verify anything about anyone without compromising on privacy. Bloom's interoperable decentralized identity technology can connect to any protocol that needs to know their customers. Bloom uses IPFS as a way to store DID documents as part of the Sidetree protocol, which is supported by multiple companies.

description.short: Decrypt news sites, hosted on IPFS
description.long: Decrypt is a popular crypto- and blockchain-focused news site devoted to demystifying the decentralized web — and hosting their content on IPFS as part of a commitment to using web3 to cover web3.

ctaCard.title: Decentralizing Decrypt
ctaCard.description: Get the details of how the Decrypt team ported to IPFS.

description.short: Collaborative, decentralized search for IPFS
description.long: Deece is an open, collaborative, and decentralized search mechanism for IPFS. Any node running the Deece client is able to crawl content on IPFS and add it to the index, which itself is stored in a decentralized manner on IPFS. This allows for decentralized search on decentralized content.

ctaCard.title: Deece readme & roadmap
ctaCard.description: Peek behind the curtain and learn what's next for Deece Search.

description.short: Mobile, peer-to-peer cash-to-crypto marketplace
description.long: Dether is a mobile-based cash-to-crypto app connecting geographically nearby buyers and sellers.

ctaCard.title: Dether + IPFS
ctaCard.description: Learn how the Dether team built a decentralized in-app chat feature using IPFS.

description.short: IPFS-based blockchain data mirror protocol
description.long: Diardi is a protocol securing a blockchain network by mirroring the blockchain data permanently on IPFS.

ctaCard.title: Introducing Scala Share
ctaCard.description: Learn how Diardi and IPFS storage come together to create an easy-to-use file share app.

description.short: Peer-to-peer discussion platform
description.long: Built on IPFS, Discussify provides a real-time, peer to peer, and permanent discussion platform for anyone to join and participate. Built on the WebExtensions API, Discussify is available for Chrome and Firefox, as well as any other browser that supports this API.

description.short: Documenting, archiving, and analyzing environmental data and policy
description.long: The Environmental Data & Governance Initiative (EDGI) documents, analyzes, and advocates for the federal provision of environmental data and governance, from policies and institutions, to public access to information, to environmental decision-making.

description.short: Simple, easy-to-use IPFS pinning service
description.long: Simple, easy-to-use, inexpensive IPFS pinning service with a Dropbox-like desktop client and a comprehensive API.

ctaCard.title: Eternum API
ctaCard.description: Quick Swagger reference for the Eternum API.

description.short: Marketplace for freelance talent
description.long: A decentralized, user-governed marketplace for freelance talent, enabling hiring and working for Ether cryptocurrency. Built on Ethereum, Aragon, and IPFS.

description.short: Platform for using front-end frameworks with dweb-focused back-end tools
description.long: Fission is a fast app publishing platform that enables front-end devs to build, host, and sell apps. The Webnative SDK is powered by IPFS and adds accounts and an encrypted file system to any app.

ctaCard.title: Fission quick-start guide
ctaCard.description: Learn how to get up and running with Fission, fast.

description.short: Developer platform for building sites and apps on the dweb
description.long: Fleek is a dweb developer platform with everything needed to build and manage sites and apps on web3 and the underlying protocols that power it: hosting, storage, gateways, domains, and more.

ctaCard.title: Fleek case study
ctaCard.description: Learn how Fleek relies on IPFS for its suite of developer tools and services.

description.short: Developer tools and APIs to build on IPFS and Filecoin
description.long: Textile is a set of open source tools that provide a decentralized database, IPFS-based storage, content hosting, and more over libp2p, IPFS, and Filecoin.

ctaCard.title: Meet Textile
ctaCard.description: An interview with Textile's Carson Farmer on their use of IPFS.

description.short: Unified digital wallet supporting multiple decentralized identities
description.long: The Identity Manager (IDM for short) is a unified digital wallet based on open-standards that aims to support multiple decentralized identities. Nomios is a reference IDM wallet Web application.

description.short: Scalable storage infrastructure with seamless API access
description.long: Scalable and distributed storage infrastructure to power the demands of applications of all sizes. Connect seamlessly and reliably to the IPFS network with Infura's IPFS API.

ctaCard.title: Infura + IPFS
ctaCard.description: Learn how to get started with Infura's IPFS service

description.short: Decentralized, incentivized publishing infrastructure
description.long: LikeCoin is a decentralized publishing infrastructure based around the International Standard Content Number (ISCN), an immutable and censorship-resilient digital content registry that functions like an International Standard Book Number (ISBN) for digital content.

ctaCard.title: LikeCoin case study
ctaCard.description: Learn how LikeCoin relies on IPFS for storing and serving ISCN-linked content.

description.short: Peer-to-peer permanence for web archives
description.long: InterPlanetary Wayback melds the standard web archiving format (WARC) with IPFS and provides a full indexing and replay system for individual to decouple their archival captures from their own machine.

ctaCard.title: Read the paper
ctaCard.description: Get all the details of InterPlanetary Wayback in this paper presented at the 2016 IEEE/ACM Joint Conference on Digital Libraries.

description.short: Public decentralized identifier network using Sidetree
description.long: ION is a public, permissionless, decentralized Identifier (DID) network that implements the blockchain-agnostic Sidetree protocol on top of Bitcoin (as a "Layer 2" overlay) to support DIDs/DPKI (Decentralized Public Key Infrastructure) at scale.

ctaCard.title: Own your identity
ctaCard.description: Learn how ION brings decentralized identity to maturity.

description.short: Automated IPFS data availability, redundancy, and orchestration
description.long: IPFS Cluster provides data orchestration across a swarm of IPFS daemons by allocating, replicating and tracking a global pinset distributed among multiple peers.

ctaCard.title: New: Collaborative clusters
ctaCard.description: Learn about how collaborative clusters improve dataset distribution and availability.

description.short: Permissioned, user-controlled decentralized storage
description.long: Kepler is a system for permissioned, user-controlled, decentralized storage based on permissioned data overlays called Orbits.

description.short: Liquidity hub for seamless token swaps
description.long: Kyber Network is a blockchain-based liquidity hub that connects liquidity from a wide range of sources to power instant and secure crypto exchange in any decentralized application without the need for an intermediary. Their KyberWidget payment button is hosted over IPFS.

ctaCard.title: Kyber developer portal
ctaCard.description: The KyberDeveloper portal offers guidance for developers looking to get started or dig deeper.

description.short: Social publication platform that returns ownership to creators
description.long: Matters integrates Web3 technologies and services in order to enable writers, journalists, novelists, and other creators to publish and monetize in a decentralized, censorship-resilient way.

ctaCard.title: Matters News in action
ctaCard.description: Learn how Matters News used IPFS to empower Chinese citizens to speak more freely about COVID-19.

description.short: Decentralized registry and marketplace for meme NFTs
description.long: Decentralized, Ethereum-based NFT marketplace and token curated registry for unique, rare memes. Built on the Ethereum blockchain, the primary goal is to enable provable ownership of memes for their creators, attaching economic and legal value to a piece of art.

ctaCard.title: Meme Factory in brief
ctaCard.description: Get an executive summary of Meme Factory and how it works.

description.short: Web3 wallet and gateway to the decentralized web
description.long: A web3 wallet designed to facilitate access to blockchain-based apps, available as a browser extention and a mobile app to provide simple, secure access to the decentralized web.

description.short: Supply-chain SaaS middleware platform
description.long: Optimize and automate supply chains by providing shipment and item visibility for safe and secure supply chains, saving companies time and money.

stats.label: Potential reduction in client email volume
Potential reduction in client manual errors

ctaCard.title: Morpheus.Network case study
ctaCard.description: Learn how Morpheus.Network is revolutionizing the supply chain using IPFS.

description.short: Client-side interface for working with the Ethereum blockchain
description.long: MyEtherWallet (MEW) is a free, client-side interface helping developers and others interact with the Ethereum blockchain. The easy-to-use, open-source platform enables generating wallets, interacting with smart contracts, and more.

ctaCard.title: Host your own website with MEW
ctaCard.description: Learn about MyEtherWallet's IPFS support for .eth and .crypto domains.

description.short: P2P auction marketplace for ENS names
description.long: A peer-to-peer, trustless, user-governed marketplace for ENS names. Built on Ethereum, Aragon, and IPFS.

ctaCard.title: district0x whitepaper
ctaCard.description: Dig into the details of district0x projects including NameBazaar in the whitepaper.

description.short: "Virtual IPFS" for private networks
description.long: Nebulus is a "Virtual IPFS" that lets you use the IPFS content-addressable file system offline and privately, without publishing content to the public IPFS network.

ctaCard.title: Getting started with Nebulus
ctaCard.description: Developer-focused documentation on how Nebulus works and a variety of use cases.

description.short: Decentralized storage for NFTs on IPFS and Filecoin
description.long: Store off-chain NFT data, decentralized on IPFS and Filecoin, and receive an IPFS hash of your content simply by uploading it.

ctaCard.title: Overview: nft.storage
ctaCard.description: Learn how nft.storage makes NFT best practices easier.

description.short: Internet browsers for iOS, Android, and desktop
description.long: Lightweight browser with privacy focus, available with IPFS integration for iOS, Android and Desktop.

ctaCard.title: IPFS in Opera Touch
ctaCard.description: Opera's iOS browser adds support for IPFS addressing.

description.short: Peer-to-peer decentralized database built on IPFS
description.long: OrbitDB is a serverless, distributed, peer-to-peer database built on IPFS for data storage and IPFS pubsub for automatically syncing databases with peers.

ctaCard.title: OrbitDB Field Manual
ctaCard.description: The official user's guide to OrbitDB.

description.short: An easy-to-use desktop app for sharing files on IPFS
description.long: Simple multi-platform desktop file sharing app: Like Dropbox, but on IPFS.

description.short: P2P secure file storage, social network, and application protocol
description.long: Peergos is a peer-to-peer, secure file storage, social network, and application protocol that aims to build a private web that protects people.

ctaCard.title: Peergos Tech Book
ctaCard.description: The complete technical guide to Peergos.

description.short: Pinning service that aims to make IPFS as easy as possible
description.long: IPFS pinning service with easy API and toolkit, designed to make IPFS as easy as possible while also providing the speed and stability required for production applications.

ctaCard.title: Pinata on Medium
ctaCard.description: Blog posts, how-to guides, and more from the Pinata team.

description.short: Automated, versioned datasets
description.long: Free, open-source tooling for cleaning, versioning, and sharing distributed datasets.

ctaCard.title: Qri Data Bazaar
ctaCard.description: Explore this home for versioned open datasets on the distributed web.

description.short: Content management, social media, and publishing platform
description.long: Quanta is a decentralized and federated content management, social media, and publishing platform that allows users to create hierarchically organized, always-editable content. Because content is "quantized" as tree nodes, it enables a more fine-grained, hierarchical approach to collaborative content.

description.short: Bitcoin fork for issuing and transferring securities or collectibles
description.long: Ravencoin is a protocol based on a fork of the Bitcoin code, adding features specifically focused on allowing tokens to be issued on the Ravencoin blockchain. These tokens can have whatever properties the issuer of the token decides — for example, they can be limited in quantity or named and issued as securities or collectibles.

ctaCard.title: Whitepapers & roadmaps
ctaCard.description: Read the Ravencoin whitepapers and stay abreast of roadmap developments.

description.short: Blockchain-based invoicing solution for crypto-friendly organizations
description.long: Compliant invoicing tools for paying and getting paid in cryptocurrency as a freelancer or business. Uses IPFS private networks on self-hosted nodes, delivered as Docker images for others to run.

ctaCard.title: Getting started with Request
ctaCard.description: Developer-focused documentation for integrating Request into invoicing workflows.

description.short: Decentralized RSS with human curation
description.long: Derived from the best of RSS, RSS3 is an open protocol designed for content and social networks in the Web 3.0 era.

ctaCard.title: RSS3 whitepaper
ctaCard.description: Dig into the details of how RSS3 works in the whitepaper.

description.short: Decentralized, permissionless, and registration-free messaging
description.long: Decentralized messenger service that enables secure private and group chats with no need to download software or register an account.

description.short: Open-source, encrypted file storage and sharing platform
description.long: Space is an open-source, encrypted, user-controlled file storage and sharing platform built on open-web protocols including IPFS, Textile, Filecoin, GunDB, and more.

ctaCard.title: Space FAQ
ctaCard.description: Quick Q-and-A for the most common questions about the Space platform.

description.short: Proof-of-stake validator service
description.long: Proof-of-stake validator service offered on a fully static website pinned on IPFS and translated in 16 languages.

description.short: Simple online interface to access blockchains and use cryptocurrencies
description.long: No-registration-needed wallet and cross-chain swaps from a simple online interface.

ctaCard.title: SwapOnline's next generation
ctaCard.description: Request early access to SwapOnline's new non-custodial multi-currency wallet with cross-chain exchange.

description.short: Scalable IPFS storage with an S3-compatible API
description.long: Making IPFS easy for enterprises and consumers alike, offering scalable plug-and-play to APIs used by some of the most trusted names in blockchain.

ctaCard.title: Temporal FAQ
ctaCard.description: Quick Q-and-A for the most common questions about Temporal.

description.short: Decentralized conversation layer for the internet
description.long: The Convo Space is a decentralized conversation layer for the internet, with customizable plugins for apps connecting conversations and communities across the net.

description.short: Registry for decentralized marketplaces
description.long: A registry for decentralized, user-governed marketplaces. Built on Ethereum, Aragon, and IPFS.

ctaCard.title: district0x whitepaper
ctaCard.description: Dig into the details of district0x projects including The District Registry in the whitepaper.

description.short: Consumer security camera with a privacy focus
description.long: Ucam is a privacy-focused home security camera utilizing the IoTeX blockchain and offering control over video access.

description.short: Decentralized protocol for automatic liquidity provision on Ethereum
description.long: Uniswap is a protocol for creating liquidity and trading ERC-20 tokens on Ethereum. It eliminates trusted intermediaries and unnecessary forms of rent extraction, allowing for fast, efficient trading.

ctaCard.title: Uniswap Interface + IPFS
ctaCard.description: Learn how Uniswap uses IPFS to empower its community to host the Uniswap Interface

description.short: Templates for building websites on IPFS
description.long: Unstoppable Domains offers templates for building IPFS websites as part of their offering of domain names plus tools for IPFS — think Go Daddy plus Wix.

description.short: On-blockchain domain names
description.long: Unstoppable Domains builds domain names on blockchain, enabling anyone with a website on IPFS to get a fully decentralized site by connecting its IPFS hash to its domain.

description.short: Release and distribution tools using web3 tech
description.long: Easily and securely distribute any software or firmware using Web3 technologies, while enforcing strong access control and security best practices. Valist also integrates with existing package managers like NPM and Pip, as well as deployment systems like Docker.

ctaCard.title: Valist FAQ
ctaCard.description: Quick Q-and-A for the most common questions about Valist.

description.short: Decentralized video streaming platform built on IPFS and OrbitDB
description.long: Built using IPFS and OrbitDB, Watchit is a video streaming and playback dApp running as a standalone Electron application.

ctaCard.title: Watchit FAQ
ctaCard.description: Quick Q-and-A for the most common questions about Watchit.

description.short: Open-hardware weather station for parametric insurance contracts
description.long: An energy- and communication-autonomous IoT sensor node with weather station that stores sensor data directly to IPFS, and automates execution of parametric weather insurance contracts on-chain via a distributed oracle system.

ctaCard.title: ESP32 + IPFS
ctaCard.description: Check out WeatherChainXM's ESP32 Arduino library for adding and retrieving files to and from IPFS.

description.short: Build apps with data persisted by Filecoin and available over IPFS
description.long: Build applications with data persisted by Filecoin and available over IPFS using one simple, free service. Get started in minutes with an easy API and web interface.

ctaCard.title: Web3.Storage docs
ctaCard.description: Jump in to using Web3.Storage with a quickstart guide and more.

description.short: Decentralized access to Wikipedia content
description.long: Offline reader for online content using IPFS to provide access to a Wikipedia mirror.

ctaCard.title: Why Wikipedia on IPFS
ctaCard.description: Learn why putting Wikipedia on IPFS improves humanity's access to information.

description.short: NFT creation tool that pins metadata and content to IPFS
description.long: A platform for novice users to engage and play with NFTs by creating decorated eggs, with metadata and content files pinned to IPFS.

description.short: Automated employee referencing and background checking tools
description.long: Zinc automates compliant, global reference and background checks for talent and HR teams.
